mapper.sql: ID, AJDZJZMLID, FILENAME, ORGNAME, FLAG, OLDSORT, OCRSORT, NEWSORT, UPLOAD_TIME, OCRCONTENT
mapper.insert:

ID,
AJDZJZMLID,
FILENAME,
ORGNAME,
FLAG,
OLDSORT,
OCRSORT,
NEWSORT,
UPLOAD_TIME,
OCRCONTENT,

mapper.update:
update ajdzjzwj
AJDZJZMLID = #{ajdzjzmlid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILENAME = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGNAME = #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OLDSORT = #{oldsort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OCRSORT = #{ocrsort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NEWSORT = #{newsort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UPLOAD_TIME = #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OCRCONTENT = #{ocrcontent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ajdzjzwj set AJDZJZMLID = #{ajdzjzmlid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILENAME = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGNAME = #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OLDSORT = #{oldsort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OCRSORT = #{ocrsort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NEWSORT = #{newsort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPLOAD_TIME = #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OCRCONTENT = #{ocrcontent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ajdzjzwj set AJDZJZMLID = #{ajdzjzmlid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILENAME = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGNAME = #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OLDSORT = #{oldsort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OCRSORT = #{ocrsort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NEWSORT = #{newsort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPLOAD_TIME = #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select from ajdzjzwj where AJDZJZMLID in
#{mlIdList} order by OLDSORT asc
mapper.delete:
delete from ajdzjzwj where AJDZJZMLID in
#{mlIdList}
mapper.select: select ID, AJDZJZMLID, FILENAME, ORGNAME, FLAG, OLDSORT, OCRSORT, NEWSORT, UPLOAD_TIME from ajdzjzwj where FLAG = #{flag}
select count(*) from ajdzjzwj where AJDZJZMLID = #{mlid}
select wj.flag,count(wj.flag) flagCount from ajdzjzwj wj left join ajdzjzml ml on ml.ID = wj.AJDZJZMLID where ml.AJBS = #{ajbs} GROUP BY wj.flag ORDER BY wj.flag desc
mapper.update: update ajdzjzwj set OLDSORT = #{oldsort,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{wjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select from ajdzjzwj where AJDZJZMLID = #{mlid} order by oldsort asc

select wj.ID, wj.AJDZJZMLID, wj.FILENAME, wj.ORGNAME, wj.FLAG, wj.OLDSORT, wj.OCRSORT, wj.NEWSORT, wj.UPLOAD_TIME from ajdzjzwj wj left join ajdzjzml ml on ml.id = wj.AJDZJZMLID where ml.AJBS = #{ajbs} and ml.ORDERBY = #{orderby} and wj.OCRSORT BETWEEN #{pageFrom} and #{pageTo} order by wj.oldsort asc
mapper.update: update ajdzjzwj set AJDZJZMLID = #{mlid},NEWSORT = #{newsort} where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: select wj.ID, wj.AJDZJZMLID, wj.FILENAME, wj.ORGNAME, wj.FLAG, wj.OLDSORT, wj.OCRSORT, wj.NEWSORT, wj.UPLOAD_TIME from ajdzjzwj wj left join ajdzjzml ml on ml.id = wj.ajdzjzmlid where ml.AJBS = #{ajbs} and ml.orderby = #{orderby} and wj.newsort is not null order by wj.OLDSORT asc

select wj.ID, wj.AJDZJZMLID, wj.FILENAME, wj.ORGNAME, wj.FLAG, wj.OLDSORT, wj.OCRSORT, wj.NEWSORT, wj.UPLOAD_TIME from ajdzjzwj wj left join ajdzjzml ml on ml.id = wj.ajdzjzmlid where ml.AJBS = #{ajbs} and wj.newsort is null order by wj.OLDSORT asc
mapper.update: update ajdzjzwj set AJDZJZMLID = #{mlid}, NEWSORT = #{maxnewsort} where ID = #{wjid}
update ajdzjzwj set AJDZJZMLID = #{mlid} where ID = #{wjid}
update ajdzjzwj set FILENAME = #{path} where ID = #{wjid}
